name: Woman Simulator
description:
You play the role of a woman who, coming home late from work, must make her way through a crowd of men, each more vicious than the next, with your cry as only weapon. Thanks to your super-human strength, which has allowed you to get to where you are at, you also allow you to break down the walls of the houses that stand in your way.

WASD = movement

1 = Scream

2 = Call the police
